Package com.github.dm.jrt.android.core.invocation

Invocation classes and interfaces specific to the Android platform.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContextInvocation<IN,OUT>
    Interface defining an invocation aware of the specific Android Context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractContextInvocation<IN,OUT>
    Base abstract implementation of a Context invocation.
    CallContextInvocation<IN,OUT>
    This is a special abstract implementation that centralizes the routine invocation inside a single method, which gets called only when all the inputs are available.
    ContextInvocationDecorator<IN,OUT>
    Base Context invocation decorator implementation.
    ContextInvocationFactory<IN,OUT>
    Abstract class defining a factory of Context invocations.
    ContextInvocationWrapper<IN,OUT>
    Implementation of a platform specific Android invocation wrapping a base invocation instance.
    DecoratingContextInvocationFactory<IN,OUT>
    Class decorating the invocations produced by a Context invocation factory.
    IdentityContextInvocation<DATA>
    Implementation of a Context invocation simply passing on the input data.
    TargetInvocationFactory<IN,OUT>
    Class representing a Context invocation factory target.
    TemplateContextInvocation<IN,OUT>
    Empty abstract implementation of a Context invocation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvocationClashException
    Exception indicating a clash of routine invocations sharing the same Loader ID, invocation type and inputs.
    LoaderClashException
    Exception indicating a clash of routine invocations with same Loader ID.
    LoaderInvocationException
    Base exception indicating that an unrecoverable error occurred during a Loader invocation execution.
    MissingLoaderException
    Exception indicating that the Loader with the specified ID, running a routine invocation, is not present.
    StaleResultException
    Exception indicating a clash of routine invocations caused by stale results.
    TypeClashException
    Exception indicating a clash of routine invocations with same Loader ID but different types.

Package com.github.dm.jrt.android.core.invocation Description

Invocation classes and interfaces specific to the Android platform.

Created by davide-maestroni on 01/08/2015.
